text: The Common Desktop Environment (CDE) is a desktop environment for Unix. It is based on the Motif widget toolkit. HP uses CDE as the default desktop manager for OpenVMS which belongs to HP. This means it will be run without making any changes. == Other websites == * AIX - * HP-UX - CDE * Solaris - CDE * Tutorial for the CDE * Open Group - CDE * CDE source code repository Category:Desktop Environments Category:Unix
title: Common Desktop Environment
